content: Looking through the PSET 4 tester, the input for shift_maker seems to be a tuple of length 3 when the docstring specifically says it should be length 2? This seems to make it impossible to pass the test case without manually editing the test case/cutting off part of the time input, which seems incorrect. Also, smaller issue, but matplotlib does not seem to want to create a window with VSCode.
subject: Test Case/Rendering Issue PSET 4
